name: Copper-Fed Salvage-o-Matic
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 10% chance of rarer materials. 20% chance of salvaging upgrades. Requires 3 copper per use.

name: Royal Pass (2 weeks)
description: Grants access to the Royal Terrace in Divinity's Reach. Redeemable at any time. Expires two weeks after first use. Double-click to display the pass.

name: Permanent Spectre Finisher

name: Permanent Thornroot Finisher

name: Musical Harp
description:
Double-click to change your skill bar, allowing you to play music for all those nearby.

Cannot be used in combat.

name: Basic Ore Node Pack
description: Double-click to create copper, silver, and gold mining nodes in your home instance. Each node can be mined once per day.
